riddle: A view of the city from high above. I can hear their prayers below.
solution: Go to the top of the Hefin Agility Course.

riddle: Being open to Chaos can raise your defences. It may also bring you closer to death. Take a moment to bottle this feeling.
solution: Create a Zamorak brew. (Mix jangerberries into a torstol potion).

riddle: Catching only one shark. That don't impress me much.
solution: Catch two sharks at once. Great white sharks count toward the challenge. You can also use a Dwarven fish extractor on the double resources mode.

riddle: Charm me and I shall unlock. But be brave in the darkness.
solution: Catch a charming moth in the Wilderness.

riddle: Corruption seeps from this stone but there are those who work to cleanse it. Lend your voice.
solution: Completely use up a cleansing crystal on the Corrupted Seren Stone. Warning: If you click away early, the clue will not be completed and the cleansing crystal will be lost, forcing you to purchase another.

riddle: Crossing the desert I met a crocodile. She gave me a dazzling smile but she had something in her teeth.
solution: Catch a plover bird in the southern part of Sophanem.

riddle: Ernie once mentioned to me a secret to improve my cooking. His idea was strong but I went the extra mile.
solution: Add a fire rune to a decorated cooking urn (nr).

riddle: Head protection is never a bad thing. Make it from rune for the best chance of survival.
solution: Smith a rune helm or rune full helm.

riddle: I have all the ingredients for soup but sometimes a simple meal tastes the best.
solution: Cook a raw shark, raw rocktail, or raw sailfish.

riddle: In a station of power someone requires assistance. Do a good deed to spread some happiness.
solution: Help Turgall at the Dorgesh-Kaan Agility Course.  You'll want to bring a light source.

riddle: I once met a man returning from market. He showed me the spoils of his day. It's precious to see what people pay for.
solution: Steal from the Ardougne Gem Stall.

riddle: I once met an ancient warrior who told me tales of his adventures. His eyes lit up as he spoke.
solution: Burn some elder logs.

riddle: Keeping all your gold together. That's a good idea. It shall be mine.
solution: Mine a concentrated gold deposit in the Living Rock Caverns.

riddle: Magical energy floats unleashed. The fluid of life that flows through us all. Span the gap to capture this energy.
solution: Siphon some blood runes from a blood esswraith, blood pool, or bloody skulls in the Runespan.

riddle: Round and round we go, burning, burning all aglow.
solution: Burn a curly root in the Jadinko Lair. You must start a firepit, not just add to one.

riddle: Rowdy Unruly Boisterous I am pie.
solution: Cook a wild pie or a wilder pie from their raw counterparts. (Some raw bear meat, raw chompy, raw rabbit, and a pie shell.) This must be done on a range outside of a POH. The Bake Pie spell does not work for this clue. A raw wild pie purchased from the grand exchange does work.

riddle: Rumours of a great shark continue to spread. Catch me one and I will be fed.
solution: Catch a raw great white shark. Can be fished at earlier levels at whirlpools.

riddle: Stare into the flames for long enough and you may see something you didn't realise was there.
solution: Light or add some magic logs onto a bonfire.

riddle: Take the journey to a distant mining site. Become a blight to your foes.
solution: Smelt a bane bar at a furnace. Any type of bane bar will count. Superheating the bar does not count for this clue.

riddle: The crystals tempt most however, there are other riches to gain for the quick-fingered.
solution: Pickpocket any elf.

riddle: The God of Order requires a sacrifice of strength but in return restores me. If only we could keep that feeling in his absence.
solution: Create a Saradomin brew. (Mix a crushed bird nest into a toadflax potion.)

riddle: The spell struck me in the chest. Perhaps if I had worn armour today. Black looks better than red.
solution: Craft a black dragonhide body.

riddle: There are those who prove themselves and become a beacon of light in the darkness. Come to the crystal city and become that figure.
solution: Use Light Form inside Prifddinas.

riddle: There is a temple where there are rivers of red. Bind the magic to get ahead.
solution: Craft some blood runes. This only works at the Blood Altar in Morytania, not the Ourania Runecrafting Altar.

riddle: Those things I once held dear continue to fade. I look upon her face and barely know who she is. But her eyes... They are still so radiant.
solution: Harvest a radiant memory on Dragontooth Island.

riddle: When I encountered this individual, she had more rings than any I had seen before.
solution: Cut some elder logs from an elder tree. The player-grown elder tree in Prifddinas works for this clue. Receiving elder logs from the polishing perk does not work.

riddle: Where there is Light there is also Death. Should you contain this you may progress.
solution: Craft some death runes. This only works at the Death Altar, not the Ourania Runecrafting Altar.
